title: I recently went on pacer to check status of my case. And it was flagged "MEANSNO" what does that mean?
question: my case discharge soon - just curious if there's something wrong with my case.
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Chapter 7 bankruptcy means test,Bankruptcy trustee,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt
answers: My colleagues are correct. MeansNo means that your case was not flagged for abuse. The court or your trustee will notify you if there is something wrong that needs to be fixed. Good luck!

Just to confirm what was said before if you saw no other issues on Pacer then your case is progressing as it should be.

Keep monitoring your case so if there is an issue you can remedy it immediately
Nothing wrong at all. That means "No Presumption of Abuse" from the Means Test.
